name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 403 Firewood Preparation for Farm Dogs
description:
This proof documents the act of cutting and preparing firewood at MaMeeFarm™ on
28 December 2025, 11:37 (local time).

The wood was prepared specifically to be used as fuel for cooking food for the farm dogs, using reclaimed bamboo and materials available on-site.
This activity represents unpaid labor dedicated to animal care, energy sourcing, and daily survival operations within the farm ecosystem.

No commercial system, subsidy, or external support was involved.
Only time, physical effort, and necessity.

Under DGCP principles, this proof anchors:

labor for non-human dependents,

energy preparation,

subsistence-level resource management,
captured directly from real-world activity without reconstruction.
